name: Ninja Warrior
description:
Ninja Warrior is a simple game that contains close fight, sword and ninja blades. You can wall-jump and fly around with your wings.

There is 3 different levels.

It's an old game like 3 years and my first game with Construct 2.

Controls are simple:

  • Arrow keys for movement,
  • Shift to wings,
  • Z to sword,
  • X to ninja blade.
